wikipedia_page.main:
Nick Ramm is an English, London-based, pianist and composer.
In 2005, he released his first album, Flashes of a Normal World, with his own band Clown Revisited. The bands he has been involved with in include The Cinematic Orchestra, Finn Peters' Finntet, Fulborn Teversham and the BBC Big Band.

response: In addition to Swinscoe, the band includes former DJ Food member PC (Patrick Carpenter) on turntables, Luke Flowers on drums, Tom Chant on saxophone, Nick Ramm on piano, Stuart McCallum on guitar, and Phil France on double bass. Former members include Jamie Coleman (trumpet), T. Daniel Howard (drums), Federico Ughi (drums), Alex James (piano), and Clean Sadness (synthesizer, programming).
* Nick Ramm, British pianist and composer
